resources.string: By clicking a button you will see corresponding information
How to fix Windows7 grub issue
How to check if a process is running

"SERVICE=appname 
 
 if ps ax | grep -v grep | grep $SERVICE > /dev/null 
 then 
 	 echo What to do when the app is running 
 else 
 	 echo What to do when the app is not running 
 fi"
